src:
Nasib Unai Emery Diputuskan di Akhir November 2019?
04 Nov 2019, 20:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Spekulasi mengenai masa depan Unai Emery memasuki babak baru. Pelatih Arsenal itu diberikan waktu sekitar satu bulan untuk menyelamatkan karirnya di London Utara.
Pada akhir pekan kemarin, Arsenal ditahan imbang oleh Wolverhampton. Sempat unggul terlebih dahulu, namun gawang The Gunners dibobol oleh Raul Jimenez di babak kedua sehingga skor 1-1 bertahan hingga akhir laga.
Ini adalah kali ketiga beruntun Arsenal kehilangan poin. Alhasil mulai ada desakan dari fans Arsenal untuk memecat pelatih asal Spanyol tersebut.
Namun Daily Mirror mengklaim bahwa manajemen Arsenal enggan gegabah dengan masa depan Emery. Untuk itu mereka masih memberikan kesempatan terhadap sang pelatih.

Simak kondisi Emery selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Unai Emery's fate was decided at the end of November 2019?
Nov 04 2019, 20:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Speculation about the future of Unai Emery is entering a new phase. The Arsenal coach was given about a month to save his career in North London.
At the weekend, Arsenal were held to a draw by Wolverhampton. Had excelled first, but the Gunners goalkeeper burglarized by Raul Jimenez in the second half so that the score lasted 1-1 until the end of the fight.
This is the third time that Arsenal have lost points. As a result there began to be pressure from Arsenal fans to fire the Spanish coach.
But the Daily Mirror claims that Arsenal's management is reluctant to be careless about Emery's future. For that they still provide an opportunity for the coach.

See the full Emery conditions below.
